tasks.label: build-minimal
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && bflat build Minimal.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin/Minimal

windows.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin && bflat build Minimal.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin\Minimal.exe

tasks.label: build-tiny
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && bflat build Tiny.cs --stdlib:zero -Os --no-pie -o bin/Tiny && strip bin/Tiny

windows.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin && bflat build Tiny.cs --stdlib:zero -Os -o bin\Tiny.exe

tasks.label: build-arena
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && bflat build Arena.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin/Arena

windows.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin && bflat build Arena.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin\Arena.exe

tasks.label: build-collections
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && bflat build Collections.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin/Collections

windows.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin && bflat build Collections.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin\Collections.exe

tasks.label: build-virtualtest

windows.command: if not exist bin mkdir bin && bflat build VirtualTest.cs --stdlib:zero -o bin\VirtualTest.exe
